flyString command
 the console command to be executed when the trigger is activated.

 indicates that the trigger's mesh is visible and should be drawn.

int enabled
 indicates that the trigger is enabled.

flyArray<flyBspObject *> objs

Detailed Description

Generic trigger class.

This class implements a generic trigger that runs a console command whenever the player's bounding box clips the trigger's mesh bounding box.
